StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [CheckSelec.onBoardHasCandidates]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @BoardID int ) AS
SELECT Count(ocb.OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID) FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD ocb INNER JOIN [dbo].[OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY] ocbsh ON ocbsh.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = ocb.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID INNER JOIN (select OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID, max(STATUS_DATE) as CURRENT_STATUS_DATE FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY group by OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID) statusDate ON ocbsh.OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID = statusDate.OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID and ocbsh.STATUS_DATE = statusDate.CURRENT_STATUS_DATE WHERE ocb.BOARD_ID = @BoardID
